title: Hollywood Costume: the Interviews
abstract: Hear from the experts about the ACMI 'Hollywood Costume' exhibition.
description: These five films take you behind the scenes and allow you to get a deeper insight about what it takes to be a costume designer and put on such a great exhibition. Filmmakers, costume designers and curators are interviewed and the works also include a sneak-peek at some of the wonderful costumes to be discovered in the 'Hollywood Costume' exhibition.
